ayas.translation: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.
WHEN THE SKY is cleft asunder,
And hearkens to its Lord and is dutiful,
When the earth is stretched out taut
And throws out whatever it contains and is empty,
And hearkens to its Lord and is dutiful,

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَـٰقِيهِ
ayas.translation: O man, you have to strive and go on striving towards your Lord, then will you meet Him.
ayas.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal-insānu innaka kādiḥun ilā rabbika kad-ḥan famulāqīh

ayas.translation: And he who is given his ledger in his right hand
Will have an easy reckoning,
And will return to his people full of joy.

ayas.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهْرِهِۦ
ayas.translation: But he who is given his ledger from behind his back
ayas.transliteration: wa-ammā man ūtiya kitābahu warā-a ẓahrih

ayas.translation: Will pray for death,
But will be roasted in the fire.
He lived rejoicing among his people,
Never thinking he will return.

ayas.arabic: بَلَىٰٓ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرًا
ayas.translation: Why not? His Lord was always watching him.
ayas.transliteration: balā inna rabbahu kāna bihi baṣīrā

ayas.translation: So indeed I call to witness the evening twilight,
And the night and all it gathers,
And the moon when at the full,
That you will climb from stage to stage.
So, wherefore do they not believe?

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
ayas.translation: And when the Qur'an is recited to them do not bow in adoration?
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā quri-a `alayhimul qur-ānu lā yasjudūn ۩

ayas.translation: In fact the unbelievers disavow.
But God knows what they harbour in their breasts.
So give them news of painful punishment,

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۭ
ayas.translation: Except those who believe and do the right: For them there is reward unending.
ayas.transliteration: illal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti lahum ajrun ghayru mamnūn
